text:
@govkristinoem @realDonaldTrump "I've always taken #COVID19 very seriously".

Anyone want to ask Dr. Fauci what he thinks about these words in relation to 7,500 people from across the US sitting elbow to elbow with hardly a mask in sight? https://t.co/kUlm4MV8tA
